Name: Unbalance
About the game: Unbalance is a minimalist physics puzzle about minimal geometry and balance. Unbalance the shape by dropping balls and make the red ball fall into right place.Join this beautiful geometric journey! Features: • 4 category with total 96 replayable levels.(48 new levels coming soon) • Unique gameplay with 3 different gameplay mechanics • Over 90 unique minimal geometric shapes • Fantastic ambient soundscapes and sound design • Color blindness mode
